definition: to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
tutorial/period of tuition for one or two students
(of a notable person etc) to honor with one's presence and offer guidance (idiom)

sentences.english: The results have important guiding significance on the production safety of fertilizer-related enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果對相關化肥企業的安全生產有指導意義。

sentences.english: Nutrition for Foodservice and Culinary Professionals, Study Guide, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 食品服務和廚房專家所需營養，研究指導，第六版。

sentences.english: Direct your actors to stay in character. Ask them to study their characters.
sentences.chinese: 指導你的演員入戲，要他們研究角色。

sentences.english: If pregnant, take an iron supplement, as recommended by an obstetrician or other health care provider.
sentences.chinese: 如懷孕，要在婦產醫生的指導下食用補鐵的食物。

sentences.english: The students and the instructor go out driving for blocks of two hours.
sentences.chinese: 指導員與學生出去練兩個小時。

sentences.english: There was no teacher to direct the class.
Let your focus be on guiding your children to develop actual discipline.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的重點落在指導孩子形成真正的紀律自制上來。

sentences.english: This conclusion plays an important theoretical guiding role in ESG designing and testing.
sentences.chinese: 其結論對靜電陀螺儀的設計與測試具有理論指導意義。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 戰俘依然受軍法約束，以及軍人守則的道德指導。

sentences.english: The Company always welcome friends from all walks of life come to guide negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 本公司隨時歡迎各界朋友親臨指導洽談。

sentences.english: Cameron has supervised the creation of a new high-definition transfer for the DVD.
sentences.chinese: 喀麥隆指導了這部DVD的全新高清晰數碼轉換。

sentences.english: If there is a dietician guides you to improve your diet habit, would it be healthier than before?
sentences.chinese: 如果有營養師指導你的飲食，會否對你的健康有幫助？

sentences.english: Therefore, without the doctor's advice, do not presumptuously use it.
sentences.chinese: 故沒有醫生的指導請不擅自使用。

sentences.english: Supervises and directs Reception and Reservations personnel.
sentences.chinese: 對接待部和預訂部工作人員進行監督和指導。

sentences.english: We got to train with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and that was really fun and he was really friendly.
sentences.chinese: 我們在索爾斯克亞的指導下訓練，這很有意思。

sentences.english: The theory provided a new way to fabricate ultra-narrow optical filters.
sentences.chinese: 這將爲設計一種全新的濾波器提供指導。

definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
